text.section:
If a registrant escapes from a facility, the supervising authority of the facility by the most reasonable and expedient means available shall immediately notify:
each local law enforcement unit where the registrant resided or habitually lived before the registrant was committed to the custody of the supervising authority; and
each person who is entitled to receive notice under § 11-715(a) of this subtitle.

If the registrant is recaptured, the supervising authority shall send notice, as soon as possible but not later than 2 working days after the supervising authority learns of the recapture, to:
each local law enforcement unit where the registrant resided or habitually lived before the registrant was committed to the custody of the supervising authority; and
each person who is entitled to receive notice under § 11-715(a) of this subtitle.
